title: Additional fees to be paid for KCET admission

comments.body: The same was told to me. Some seniors told me that kcet + extra fees would sum up to 1.2 lakh. And when we asked them again, they said it would be finalized in a month or so..
Is the extra fees only in the first year or all 4 years?
I don't know. But I think it's for all 4 years..
the same fees carries over for all 4 years through KCET
I did not pay any extra fee, but they said we'll have to pay the exam fee later. I'm not sure how much that is
